'''''Versus Mishima Michitoshi''''' is an Event Quest that unlocks the third challenge of [[Clash of Lone Blades]] during the [[Hues of the Violet Garden]] event.

==Steps==
# Talk to [[Mishima Michitoshi]]

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Here he comes &mdash; the samurai whose thoughts no one can really fathom, Mishima Michitoshi!}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Mishima Michitoshi)
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' Who are you?
:{{DIcon}} I'm {{Traveler}}.
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' Long have I waited.
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' Strike I shall, and triumph.
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' {{sic|Blond-haired<!--Doesn't change based on gender-->}} {{MC|m=boy|f=girl}}.
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' Not my match.
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' After this battle.
:'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' Triumph tomorrow.
:{{DIcon}} Bring it on.
:;(Opens Clash of Lone Blades menu)
:{{DIcon}} Give me a second to prepare.
::'''Mishima Michitoshi:''' Be quick.
{{Dialogue End}}
